snippet.setting: Specify the quantity to be calculated (probabilities, densities, or quantiles), and the quantity given (probabilities or quantiles)
When calculating densities or probabilities, specify the number of evenly spaces quantiles to show. Alternatively, use the setting above.
When calculating densities or probabilities, specify one or more quantiles. Alternatively, leave this empty to use the setting above, instead.
When calculating quantiles, specify the number of evenly spaced probabilities (optionally logarithmic) to show. Alternatively, use the setting below.
When calculating quantiles, specify one or more probabilities, optionally logarithmic (see below). If this setting is left empty, the setting above is used, instead.
When calculating probabilities, return these as log (p). When specifying probabilities, these are supplied as log (p).
When calculating densities, return these as log (d).

snippet.usage: Select the desired mode of operation, then specify the values of interest. The input values (quantiles or probabilities) can be left empty, in which case a short sequence of evenly spaced values will be filled in, automatically.
